replies.author: jacky1440
replies.txt_content:
ww920232827 发表于 2012-1-27 20:48 
http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/511421-100herobrine-201/  最好教教我怎么安装
需要Modloader和Audios Mod
1.把intominecraft文件夹里面东西扔到Minecraft。jar
2. 复制Herobrain文件夹到。minecraft文件夹里~
记得除掉Meta-If
3.打开游戏HAVE FUN
